Perceptor/nighlight/hdyras:

"She wont remember you"said dryly perceptor "F=
or her you will be a stranger, it's up to you to make her love you"

Nightl=
ight started to move while Hydras smiled and said "She's awaking"

********=
*****

Weakness, confuntion... Nothing had sense to her, a whirpool of soun=
ds sorrounded her as a confusin chorus that she struggle to understand. Slo=
wly she started to open her Eyes and stood up but her body didnt answer her=
; she feel so weak, she only desires to surrender and fell in the uncounceo=
s once more but she feel  that a danger was around here her but she didnt k=
new what kind of danger was.

Finally she could open her eyes and sit down =
in the gravity car looking the three males but not knowing their names. Her=
 eyes opened with fear.

"Calm down little one"said Kindly Hydras "It's ok,=
 all it's ok... YOu're among friends..."

Nightlight started to look the ot=
her two males, one of them was so familiar but she couldnt remember why.

"=
Now Little one, I'm your Commander, I'm Hydras"said the Predacon Leader and=
 pointing to Precerptor and Rodimus said"He is Perceptor, and Rodimus..."

=
"My name..."Nighlight said with grief"I dont know what's my name"

"calm do=
wn, Little one"said again Hydras "That's not a big deal, that's true you wi=
ll need a name... One that fits you, a true Predacon one... Maybe, Percepto=
r and Rodimus could help you to find one, exist some good female predacons =
warriors... Just Relax, Little one and take it easy " Nightlight smiled, al=
l her fears was imaginaries and hydras continue "Perceptor will check you a=
nd when he considers that you are alright, you are allowed to wander around=
; for a while you have to remain in the base." Nightlight nodded "Perceptor=
 keep me up date, see you soon"

hydras leave the medical base while Percep=
tor started to check Nightlight


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Saturday, Ma=

Subject: Re: Recovering Ro=

> Then looked for Rodimus he said "Perhap, You Rod=
imus could assit Perceptor, when your main obligation allowed to do it"

Ro=
dimus blinked as he looked from Perceptor to Hydras and then back to
Percep=
tor again. "Me?" he said, clearly not expecting to be assigned
this task.

=
However he quickly straightened as he assumed a more confident pose.
"Yes."=
 he said, nodding his head once. "I will do it." He glanced down
at Nightli=
ght, his face slightly curious as he looked at her form.
"After all, she is=
 my wife . . . right?" A small smile appeared on his
face. "Perhaps she can=
 continue to be so."

(TAG)

Preston
